rugby.title: The Ultimate Rivalry: Springboks vs All Blacks
rugby.description: The greatest rivalry in world rugby returns to Cape Town. Witness the Springboks face the All Blacks in this epic Rugby Championship showdown.

rugby.title: Nations Championship 2026
rugby.description: The groundbreaking new global rugby competition featuring the world's top nations. Be part of history as South Africa competes in this landmark tournament.
features: VIP hospitality at all SA venues

rugby.title: European Champions Cup - SA Derbies
rugby.description: Watch the Stormers, Sharks, and Bulls compete against Europe's elite in the prestigious Champions Cup. Historic European club rugby comes to South Africa.

rugby.title: United Rugby Championship
rugby.description: Follow the Stormers, Sharks, Bulls, and Lions through the URC season. Experience the best club rugby competition in the world.

rugby.title: HSBC Cape Town Sevens
rugby.description: The world's greatest sevens party returns to the Mother City! Two days of fast-paced rugby, incredible atmosphere, and world-class entertainment.

rugby.title: Cape Town 10s
rugby.description: The world's largest amateur rugby festival. Over 200 teams from 20+ countries compete in this legendary social rugby tournament.

rugby.title: Springbok Home Internationals
rugby.description: Experience the world champions at home. All Springbok test matches against touring nations and Rugby Championship fixtures.

cricket.title: Betway SA20 2026
cricket.description: South Africa's premier T20 franchise league featuring the world's best cricketers. Fast-paced action, electric atmospheres, and world-class entertainment.

cricket.title: Proteas Test Series
cricket.description: Experience the pinnacle of cricket at iconic venues. Watch the Proteas battle touring nations in the ultimate test of skill and endurance.

cricket.title: Proteas ODI & T20I Series
cricket.description: White-ball cricket action featuring the Proteas against touring nations. High-octane entertainment in limited-overs format.

football.title: Bafana Bafana World Cup Qualifiers
football.description: Support Bafana Bafana on their journey to the FIFA World Cup. Experience the passion of South African football at its finest.

football.title: Premier Soccer League
football.description: Experience the passion of South African club football. Big matches featuring Kaizer Chiefs, Orlando Pirates, Mamelodi Sundowns, and Cape Town City.

football.title: AFCON Qualifiers
football.description: Watch Bafana Bafana compete for Africa Cup of Nations qualification. Crucial continental clashes with electric atmospheres.

hockey.title: FIH Hockey Pro League
hockey.description: World-class international hockey comes to Cape Town. Watch the SA Men's and Women's teams compete against the world's best in this prestigious league.

hockey.title: SA Hockey Interprovincial
hockey.description: South Africa's premier domestic hockey tournament. Provincial teams battle for national supremacy in this intense competition.

netball.title: Netball World Cup 2027
netball.description: South Africa hosts the Netball World Cup! A once-in-a-generation opportunity to see the world's best netballers compete on home soil. Early bird packages now available.

netball.title: SPAR Proteas Test Series
netball.description: Watch the SPAR Proteas, one of the world's top-ranked teams, compete in international test series against global netball powers.

netball.title: Telkom Netball League
netball.description: South Africa's premier domestic netball competition. Watch the country's best provincial teams compete for the national title.
